title: Everything You Need to Know about the Phoenix Fruit in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Cost.
steps.content: Cost. Phoenix is a legendary beast-type Fruit that costs 1,800,000 Beli or 2,000 Robux.

steps.title: Usage.
steps.content: Usage. Phoenix skills are more designed to support your allies. It has 1 large AOE skill for damage, so it isn't the most effective offensive Fruit (see this wikiHow article for more on rankings of Fruits in Blox Fruits). When transformed, you can be a decent support in raids for your healing skills. Some Blox Fruit players [1] X Research source prefer Light over Phoenix Fruit. So is Phoenix Fruit a good Fruit? Depends on your play style. If you want to raid with others, Phoenix Fruit is a great Fruit for support and healing roles. However, if you're mostly a solo player, a Fruit with higher damage will be better for you.

steps.title: Awakened is fairly good for farming sea events.
steps.content: Awakened is fairly good for farming sea events. The Awakened move F Swift Flight allows you to move and deal damage over time.

steps.title: It costs 18, 500 fragments to fully Awaken.
steps.content: It costs 18, 500 fragments to fully Awaken. You can farm for fragments by raiding or defeating Indra and Blackbeard. You'll earn "The Phoenix" title when you Awaken at least 1 move of this fruit.

steps.title: It has a different Awakening process.
steps.content: It has a different Awakening process. Unlike other Fruits, the Awakening process is a little different: Obtain 400+ mastery in the Phoenix Fruit , and Talk to Sick Scientist to buy the Phoenix Raid Chip for 1,000 fragments or a physical Fruit worth at least 1,000,000 beli. If you don't have 400+ mastery in the Phoenix Fruit, you can join a Phoenix raid someone else is hosting. That way, you can Awaken your Phoenix Fruit without needing 400+ mastery in it. Check out our article on leveling Fruits to quickly get 400+ mastery in Phoenix Fruit.

steps.title: Cannon/Z.
steps.content: Cannon/ Z . 1 mastery. You charge up a flaming blow and release it forward, resulting in a powerful mid-range attack with good knockback. Being transformed increases the range and makes it an AOE attack.

steps.title: Hybrid Flight/F.
steps.content: Hybrid Flight/ F . 30 mastery. You can fly in hybrid form. Hold F to keep flying. You can't use this skill if you're transformed.

steps.title: Regeneration Flames/X.
steps.content: Regeneration Flames/ X . 90 mastery. Blue and yellow flames surround you as you gain health. The effect is an AOE (area-of-effect), so any nearby players (allies or not) will also gain health. This skill consumes a lot of energy. Being transformed increases the AOE range.

steps.title: Fast Kick/C.
steps.content: Fast Kick/ C . 160 mastery. You dash forward and quickly kick in the direction you're facing. This move has a short cooldown. Being transformed has no effect.

steps.title: Full Transformation/V.
steps.content: Full Transformation/ V . 250 mastery. You turn into a blue and yellow phoenix that costs 10 energy every 1.5 seconds. Pressing V again will turn you back to your human form.

steps.title: Left-click/Normal attack.
steps.content: Left-click/Normal attack. 4,000 fragments. Consumes 40 energy . You dash in the direction of the cursor, stunning enemies in your path.

steps.title: Cremation Cannon/Z.
steps.content: Cremation Cannon/ Z . 1 mastery; 500 fragments. Consumes 60 energy . Shoot flames towards the cursor that explode on contact and leave a flaming trail on the ground that will cause ticking damage to anyone who crosses it. Being transformed increases the range and slightly decreases damage.

steps.title: Swift Flight/F.
steps.content: Swift Flight/ F . 30 mastery; 2,000 fragments. You can fly in hybrid form. Hold F to keep flying and use the movement keys to move. If you stop while holding F , blue and yellow flames drip below, causing small ticking damage to anyone below. You can't use this skill if you're transformed.

steps.title: BlueFlames/X.
steps.content: BlueFlames/ X . 90 mastery; 3,000 fragments. A bubble surrounds and heals you for as long as X is held. The bubble also acts as a barrier against incoming attacks and knocks back anything that comes close. The effect is an AOE (area-of-effect), so any nearby players (allies or not) will also gain health. This skill consumes a lot of energy. Being transformed increases the bubble's size and healing range.

steps.title: Flame Exodus/C.
steps.content: Flame Exodus/ C . 160 mastery; 4,000 fragments. Consumes 40 energy . Dash forward and anything in your path is lifted in a tornado-like attack with your phoenix flames. Crash into the enemies caught in your tornado and explode, causing AOE damage. Being transformed causes the flames to stay on the ground and cause ticking damage to others.

steps.title: Blazing Plumage/V.
steps.content: Blazing Plumage/ V . 250 mastery; 5,000 fragments. Consumes 10 energy per second. Transform into a blue and yellow phoenix and improve every skill. This form buffs healing by ~20% and gains 15% defense. You can fly without using a skill, but you cannot use any weapon other than the Phoenix Fruit. This form leaves flames on the ground that deal a good amount of damage if anyone crosses it. Pressing V again will turn you back to your human form. [2] X Research source
